name: 李明哲
objective:
1.Introduction to VLSI Design
2.Introduction to EDA tools (ADFT 16nm FinFET + T18)
3.Circuit/System simulation
4.Layout drawing/verifications (DRC)
5.VLSI Design & Testing Techniques
schedule:
week  1      Course Introduction
week  2      Process Overview
week  3      Design environment & Simulation
week  4-5    Layout Introduction
week  6      Laker & Calibre DRC
week  7      Various Inverters
week  8      Transient responses
week  9      Mid-term project
week 10      Combinational Circuits
week 11      Arithmetic circuits
week 12      Sequential Circuits
week 13      Dynamic logic
week 14-15   Memories
week 16      VLSI Testing
Week 17      Low-power techniques
week 18      Final project
scorePolicy:
Attendance: 20%
Homework + Classwork: 20%
Mid-term project: 30%
Final project: 30%
materials:
(1) Sung-Mo. Kang and Yusuf Leblebici, “CMOS Integrated Circuits – Analysis and Design”, McGraw-Hill
(2) Jan M. Rabaey, “Digital Integrated Circuits”, Prentice Hall
(3) Michael L. Bushnell and Vishwani D. Agrawal, "Essentials of Electronic Testing for Digital, Memory and Mixed-Signal VLSI Circuits," Kluwer Academic Publishers
consultation: (1) 辦公室：綜科 311-1 室 (2) Office Hours: 如系統公告 (3) Email: minglee@ntut.edu.tw
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG1：消除貧窮（No Poverty）SDG4：優質教育（Quality Education）
課程是否導入AI: ● 鼓勵學生使用生成式 AI 工具（Encourage students to use generative AI tools）
remarks: (1) 本課程將以英文授課，內容將包含積體電路設計流程中大部分的 tool 使用教學，歡迎有興趣的同學多加利用選修。(2) 電路設計與模擬相關軟體受智慧財產權相關法律所保護，請修課同學們務必遵守保密協定，切勿對軟體之任何相關畫面進行截圖、照相或錄影，亦不可將相關技術文件內所含之內容外洩，以觸法。(3) 因教室設備關係，本課程將使用 Microsoft Teams 作為教學輔助平台 (不會使用北科 i 學園 Plus)
